name: SHHHH! Daddy's Working
description:
Your obedient boy helps to insure you "very productive work time" goes undisturbed.

Player One (The Hardworking Father):

type away at your "work" and complete as many important tasks as you can before time runs out.

Player Two (The Obedient Son):

click away distractions with your mouse to help insure your daddy can work on his VERY important papers in peace.
